body.name: Electrolux Portable Handheld Garment and Fabric Steamer 1500 Watts, Quick Heat Ceramic Plate Steam Nozzle, 2 in 1 Fabric Wrinkle Remover and Clothing Iron, with Fabric, Lint Brush, and Steam Nozzle
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 12 hrs 5 mins
FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 22 hrs 50 mins
features: INCLUDES - The steamer with a 12-foot power cord, Fabric brush, lint brush and steam nozzle rests on a heavy duty ceramic sole plate providing versatile and safety steaming options

REMOVES CREASES EFFICIENTLY-Steamer reheats in only 30 seconds, with large detachable 300 ml (10 oz.) water tank for 18 minutes of continuous steaming. The steamer will automatically turn off if not in use.
DURABLE QUALITY- Pump steam technology no leaking, no spilling, allows you to steam your clothes while hanging vertically or lying horizontally. Steamer is compacted and easy to travel with.
EXTREME STEAM- Steam any fabric from cotton, wool, silk, fiber etc. Wrinkle free and refresh everything from clothing to bedding and curtains.

Electrolux products are manufactured to reduce household energy and avoid the depletion of natural resources in order to maintain an ecological balance. We work actively with sustainable energy strategies, human rights, and zero waster to landfill to improve our operations. We pride ourselves in keeping the pursuit of global environmental sustainability.
body.description: A 1500w handheld steamer with 2 steam level variations, electromagnetic pump, auto shut-off, removable water tank, ceramic soleplate, and fabric brush. Heats up in under 30 seconds, steams continuously for up to 18 minutes. This package contains one handheld steamer with 12 foot cord. Imported.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this steamer!
reviews.reviewText: This Electrolux steamer is so easy to use and it works great. I did a lot of research before choosing this one and I'm glad I did. This steamer gets the wrinkles out, and it's lightweight to hold. It's so easy, just add water to the container and it heats up quickly. I like that you can use it vertically or horizontally. This is the best steamer out there!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This steamer seemed a bit on the expensive side, but after reading the reviews I decided to give it a try. I am so very glad I did! I use the steamer to getting creases out of my backdrops for photography. I have used other steamers to no avail and this was my saving grace! It works absolutely wonderful! It takes me almost no time to get rid of the creases no matter how hard the crease. What a joy! Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars By far the sexiest & best quality hand steamer of 'em all!
reviews.reviewText: I have now purchased and tried about 6-7 different steamers, in just about every price range and "this is the one"...I am keeping! Gosh, this has been a pain in the butt! When I buy some thing, I thoroughly go through the reviews, first, and I have been highly disappointed! One, right after the other, after the other! It shouldn't be that hard to find an awesome steamer, especially with reviews attached to them! Maybe my expectations are too high, for the average person? But honestly? I was quite surprised by 'their' reviews, versus mine! For one thing, I want an easy to fill reservoir, and one that I can steam a few items at a time! I didn't realize, some of the steamers "require" distilled water!? Are you kidding me? I don't want to have to keep distilled bottled water on hand, just for that!? And secondly, my eyesight isn't all that! And trying to pour water into a teeny tiny hole? Are you kidding me?? Flimsy, and cheaply made, is what I kept experiencing, not to mention, some didn't work that well at all! In fact, the last one? Was a generic brand, in the same price range as this one, yet it had even BETTER REVIEWS! So naturally, I thought it's gotta be better than the 'name brand' one!Well?!What a joke! It too, was a touchscreen, which made me super hesitant to try this one! Because it took me several, very frustrating minutes, for it to even respond to ANY touch! Yet once it did? It worked beautifully! That was, until, I couldn't get it turn it off! I finally had no other choice, but to pull the plug!!!Hence! Being that it took me going through a minimum of six different steamers?!! I hesitated for over a month to even give it another shot! But boy! Was I ever blown away, with relief...even at FIRST GLANCE! From the box, yep, from the box, to the instrument itself! It's 'SEXY' in and of it self! AND BEST OF ALL...IT "ACTUALLY WORKS"...BEAUTIFULLY!!! Thanks to a tried and trustworthy company/name BRAND, that you actually can......TRUST!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This steamer is perfect for me. It is lightweight and designed well for ease of use. The water tank is a good sized to steam several garments. The cord is long enough to use easily and have enough length to reach top to bottom on long items. Quality product. Sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best handheld steamer out there for the price
reviews.reviewText: One of the things I love about this steamer is its quick heat-up time. It's ready to use in just 30 seconds, which is much faster than some other steamers I've tried. It also has a large water tank that provides plenty of steaming time and allows you to steam pretty much anything.This steamer comes with a few additional features that make it even more versatile. It has a fabric brush that can be used to loosen lint and dirt before steaming, and it also has a lint brush attachment that can be used to remove lint and pet hair from clothes and furniture.Overall ImpressionI highly recommend the Electrolux Portable Handheld Garment and Fabric Steamer. It is a powerful, versatile, and easy-to-use steamer that is perfect for a variety of household tasks.Pros:- Quick heat-up time- Continuous steaming for a long time- Great at getting out wrinkles- Fabric brush and lint brush attachmentsCons:- The water tank could be a bit larger- The steamer can get a bit hot to the touch

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient and very easy to ship and receive.
reviews.reviewText: It was very easy to use, and it works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works!! Good first steamer
reviews.reviewText: Was looking to change over from a traditonal iron since I have a lot of clothing that needs to either be dry cleaned to get wrinkles out since its not iron safe.Did some half done photos as an example, some things I noticed was it definitely takes more than 30 seconds to heat. I say plug it in and let it warm up for 3-5 minutes or if you have really delicate clothes just get started on those. If this is also your first steamer do not expect a white plume of steam coming out, the steam is very fine and you will not be able to see it all the time. This unit did not spurt any water droplets and produced fine hot steam the entire time which was nice to see. Also please use distilled water, if you do not want to deal with weird dark colored spots on your clothing from it spitting out debris build up, use DI water.As for actual usage look up a video on how to use a steamer should only take 2ish minutes per shirt if you are just doing a go over to get out light wrinkles and using it correctly.As for cons there are 2, first is that the head part that heats up to warm the steam gets HOT. As long as your hand never goes above the steam trigger it will be handleable. Second, due to the head getting so hot I dont see this lasting a long time since all parts are plastic on the inside and are due to warp over time. But for the price point I dont mind rebuying every handful of years. Happy steaming!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It does work ,easy to use it.price and quality of the maci is good .love it
It took me some time to look and consider which steamer to buy and I went with this one! Good quality and works perfectly! I can recommend it without a doubt!

I’m so glad I bought this steamer! It’s compact and easy to use. It steams and irons my clothes very well. I don’t need to iron anything when I have this. The quality is there. I would definitely recommend this steamer to anyone. It’s compact enough for home and travel.

reviews.reviewTitle: facil de usar, de guardar y obtienes el mejor resultado
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta, y la presentación del producto mas de lo esperado

This steamer gets wrinkles out fast. I average about 20 - 25 minutes of continuous use on a full tank of water. That's more then enough time to iron several items of clothing.It takes about 20 seconds for the steamer to heat up. Removing the water tank is as easy as pressing a button. The steamer is very light weight as well so it's very portable.
